title: Arithmetic Operations Master
description: Create a program that performs a series of arithmetic operations on two input numbers. The operations include addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, modulus, and exponentiation. The program should first ask the user to input two numbers, then perform the operations, and finally print the results in a formatted manner.
sample_output:
Addition: 13
Subtraction: 7
Multiplication: 30
Division: 3.3333333333333335
Modulus: 1
Exponentiation: 1000
